# Copilot Instructions for Swift Isolation Explore

## Build and Test Requirements

When making changes to this repository, always verify that the project builds and passes tests:

- Build the project: `swift build`
- Run tests: `swift test`

## Code Quality

- Ensure all changes maintain compatibility with the Swift version used by the project
- Follow Swift naming conventions and coding standards
- Write clear, self-documenting code with appropriate comments where needed
- Ensure all tests pass before submitting changes
